solution_line_template: The price of one performance is {performance_duration_hours} * ${price_per_hour} = $<<{performance_duration_hours}*{price_per_hour}={price_per_performance}>>{price_per_performance}.
Mark intends to go to the theater once a week, so in 9 weeks he will spend {num_weeks} * ${price_per_performance} = $<<{num_weeks}*{price_per_performance}={total_spend}>>{total_spend}.
